name: MLS Teams
content:
Description: Data about all current Major League Soccer (MLS) teams, as of the 2022 season

Source: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_League_Soccer)

Columns: 

* Team (string): name of the team
* Location (string): city and state the team is located in
* Stadium (string): name of the stadium the team plays home games in
* Capacity (numerical): how many seats the stadium holds for attendees
* Joined (numerical): what year that team officially joined the MLS
* Head coach (string): name of that team's head coach
* Conference (string): whether the team is in the Eastern or Western MLS conference
